name: SpaceOut (Will Harding)
description: An Arkanoid/Breakout game made in JavaScript using Three.js. This game is where I coined the term "Brain Soup", as trying to code an OOP game using them turned my brain to soup. I will honestly be surprised if you can get this to work. It's not a bad little breakout game though when it does work, got a few different powerups and visual effects.
